评论详情: Although I like this shirt and the style idea very much, I’m not sure if it hangs quite like I thought it would Though I think the fit is right  Comfortable to wear and a nice slightly more dressy casual blouse

The bright pink is a good color but the fabric is really thin.  I prefer 1X in most name brands but Amazon suggested the 2X, which I bought. The fit is OK, but this shirt is a bit short on my 5'7" body and only hits the top of my hips so when my arms are overhead at the gym, this shirt will be above the waistband of my shorts/leggings.  I may be wearing this as a thin layer under a sweatshirt.

评论概述: Adorable. Size up if you're between sizes!
评论详情: I'm 5'6 and weigh 155lbs. I'm often in between a medium and large in women's tops, so I bought both to see which fit better. The medium fit okay, but because of the side slits, the large fit much better. The medium just didn't drape right. Now that I've figured out the sizing, I plan to buy this in multiple colors. It's cute and perfect for the gym when paired with some cute leggings!

Fabric is comfortable. Like the longer length.  However, the front rides up while sprint walking. If the neckline weren’t so tight (which is slightly uncomfortable), the back would really hang down. Just not comfortable enough for moi.

First of all, the packaging/ presentation is great, nicely wrapped. Then the actual shirt . . fabric blend is wonderful, washes very well, sizing is perfect (I ordered a medium). Love the bottom - separate seams front vs back. I will be ordering more!

This shirt is my favorite for working out because of the quality of the fabric and the looseness in the right places. . I am 5’3” and the length is perfect ( not too long). The fabric is opaque and the white is not see through. I also have the pink and just ordered the blue. I accidentally put it in the dryer when the tag says line dry, but it did not seem to shrink. I like how the shirt is loose in the front and does not cling to the abdominal area.

So very much wanted to like this shirt - it was a great color and body fit was good - HOWEVER, it was NOT as depicted on the website. My first shirt arrived and the back panel was 3" shorter than the front - pretty much the exact opposite as shown on website picture.  It felt, and looked, like a complete mismatch of sizes.  I returned that shirt and asked for a replacement - only to have the same problem with the second shirt. While the difference was not as striking, the back panel was definitely shorter than the front even when laid out on a flat surface. So, it too was returned.  This was my first purchase of Gym People clothing and I was not impressed.
Nice material
Love the color
I wear this shirt for yoga and pickleball.
Feels good.  Fits well  Pleats on each side will have to get used to
I bought 2 matching sets of joggers and this top.  Neither “set” actually matches despite being the same color.  Sending back for this reason.  Disappointed!

I like the shirt but after the first wash, the accent stitching kind of encouraged wrinkling and slight shrinking of the thread. I had higher hopes from washing but…. The wrinkles fell out a while after wearing. The color is pretty and the shirt is quite comfortable.  Great for working out … or not! Lol
Aunque no quedó tan larga como deseaba la tela es muy buena y es cómoda.
Color was not what I expected needed a top with more green to it, otherwise top was very nice, size was true size, just didn’t like color.
I really like this blouse. It cool and comfortable and I like the style of it!
The color is navy blue. The material is not as breathable as I would have liked. I wash and hang dry. It did not shrink.Good value for the mobey!!
Very nice fabric and style. Just didn't like the color. It was more beige than green
I personally reorder multiple gym people brand products.  Highly recommend.

If you are in between mediums and large, you might be able to get by with a medium depending on build. I ordered a large and could have fit into a medium. I actually like that is a little big on me but was not planning on it to be big. Otherwise it is very comfortable and I would purchase again
This top is well-made. It has good wicking properties. Easy to move in.
I love the color. It’s very comfortable. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 stars is because it is a little short. The photo on line to me looks longer than it actually is

I ordered two t-shirts, and the experience was somewhat inconsistent. One t-shirt arrived perfectly packaged and in excellent condition, just as expected for a new item. However, the other t-shirt arrived in a rather disappointing state: it was extremely wrinkled and seemed as if it had been previously opened, almost like it was a renewed item. This contrast in packaging and presentation impacted my overall experience with the purchase.

I wanted to like this shirt but it didn't work. Even the XXL was too fitted through my waist. It was more of a fit and flare look. I'm more of a roomy in the waist with a good placement on the hips kind of person. I found another shirt which was perfect. The fabric was OK. Really silky which was not my fave.

I am getting tired of buying shirts that say they are loose fitting but are not. This one is. I wish the sleeves were slightly shorter,  but I knew from the picture that they were not. I bought three colors but only the black arrived so far. I am sure the others, a pink and a white, will be the same. The hem is a nice shape. The fit is true to size; I waver between small and medium (having put on a few pounds) so I got a medium but I believe that a small might have been better. However I am not going to return them to find out; these will be fine.
Nice style, comfortable material, runs very small.
I tried so many kinds of gym shirts and finally I found one that is loose but flattering and fits so nicely top to bottom. I got two and love them!
Very comfortable soft material.  I like the relaxed fit. Took one star off for the color. Image looks like a rose pink but in person it’s more of a coral pink.
There are strange flaps that don't  lay down as they should but I bought this for around my home so I  am keeping it.

The shirt is cute, and the fabric is lovely.  However, I did not get along well with the cut of the neck.  I thought at first that I had put it on backwards since the neck rode up.  I turned it around and had the same problem.  LOL.  No one else out there may have this problem.  Just saying it did not suit me.

A very nice shirt! The material is super soft and cool. It feels very high quality for a $20 shirt. It fits true to size, if not possibly a little on the large side. I'm typically an XL/XXL and the XL in this shirt was just right with a relaxed fit. My only complaint was about the color. I ordered the rose color which looks like a dusty pink in the description but it was more of a bubblegum in person. Not the best for me, so I am returning it and plan on ordering it in another color. I would like to have multiples in this shirt because it is so comfortable and great for working out as well as errands and school drop-offs etc.
So very comfy; moves when the body moves.  I purchased 3 of different colors.

I purchased black and brown in medium and was worried that they would be too big but the fit is well designed and relaxed and the blend of cotton, rayon and spandex is comfortable and lightweight.  Slide slits add interest to the shirts.  These would be good worn with yoga pants and jeans.
Casual t-shirt, good for exercise or around the house.  Need to be careful and remove from dryer when almost dry and lay flat and smooth out wrinkles.
Love the fit and feel of this shirt, however the color is very different from what is advertised.
Nice, but I need a different size which I will order today.
Love the material,
Es de buena calidad , tal vez un poquito estrecha
The shirt fits nice and washes well. It’s just a bit thinner than I would have liked.

评论概述: Cute but you will need to iron
评论详情: The shirt fits fine. I’m 5’8” & 155 lbs. The issue I have is that for a ‘Gym’ shirt, you should not have to iron it . Also, it does wrinkle very quickly when wearing.
It's flattering and fits well.

评论概述: Great for outside walking. Cool top
评论详情: Nice fit, nice color.

Love the colors, shirt is well made just runs a little small. I am 5’7 120 pounds and usually wear a XS or S but I had to go with a medium. ( bust 36-38).  If you are between sizes I’d size up for sure. Shirt is also a little short in the front.  I love the side pleats. I will def get more!
Amazon recommended Small. I ordered Medium. I needed Large.  Medium will do so I will not return.
The fit was true to size. I love the longer back. Well made. Bought it in black and navy.
Sized accurately, not clingy and very comfortable

I am very picky about my gym shirts as I do not like them to be tight around my midsection. I thought I would give this shirt a try and I loved it so much that I bought 2 more. They are soft, stretchy, and have flow. I definitely recommend!
It's a nice shirt 👕
I absolutely loved this shirt, however it shrank.  Make sure you hang to dry.

Fits true to size. Love this shirt to work out in or just for daily wearing. Love the way it fits my body, doesn’t cling. The side/back detail gives it a different look as well. I own this in five colors!
I like the style & detail. But they didn’t drape well on me even tho I’m well proportioned in my bust & hips. They might well be fine for others.

Was so excited for this shirt - I have been looking for workout shirts that provide coverage while being light and wicking. This shirt came in the perfect color, but the hem of the shirt was not the length shown in photos. Additionally, the back hem came in a different kind of fabric, and quickly got static after trying on. Because of that, along with a shorter hem, the shirt rode up from walking around in it.
I wear this shirt to yoga.  It is light weight and cool for exercise.  The fit may be a bit smaller than "true to size".  Order up a size and you will be fine.

I bought 4 different white shirts from different manufacturers, including name brand. This one is the clear winner. The white is not see-through, it’s a silky breathable fabric, and it’s comfortable. I’m a 1X, 16W, and it doesn’t pull across my middle. I am returning the other shirts and buying more of this brand in different colors.

I have three of these shirts and I absolutely love them. They are comfortable, fit true to size, and I feel my body can breath in the heat and humidity. I have washed and dried them and the shape and color have been the same since they were new.

They hold up great and are super light weight! I wear them around the house or out for walks and they’re perfect for either- they feel cool on and look great with leggings. I own in 2 colors so far and will be buying more!

I bought these shirts because I like the material and the way they are cut.  They do not disappoint.  I absolutely love these shirts.  I bought four of them in different colors and they fit so well and they are cool to the touch.  They breath and look fantastic.

I have two of these shirts in black and they’re great for the gym. They’re flowy and not restricting. Unfortunately, I tried this shirt in white, but it’s completely see through, so I only wear it at home. I’m 5’2 and 135 pounds for reference and a small fit perfectly.

I bought this shirt after ruining my lululemon one, this one looked very similar so I chose it. It is thicker than the LL but doesn’t feel hotter. I got the white and you can’t see sweat. I will be purchasing other colors.
me fascino!
Not a flattering cut

I am 5’6 and I found this top short for my workouts.  I like to keep my stomach re covered nd one raise of the arm rises this shirt to top of band on leggings.  If it were longer as the picture seemingly papers, this would be a perfect workout hirt
I purchased this and I loved the look and material, but it runs small. Unfortunately they don’t have larger sizes. I was disappointed 😔
Soft fabric and has a neat appearance. Breathable and super comfortable

Order this shirt for just something quick and cheep to workout in. I don't have much lunch with a lot of clothing but it fits great, looks great, and feels pretty good. Ended up buying two more. Have washed them twice so far and they seem to be holding up.
I ordered 2 different colors and I am so happy I did.  The t/shirt is comfortable, w/o being bulky.  It hangs perfectly- fit and length.  I may just have to purchase more colors!

评论概述: Comfortable and stylish in hot, humid weather
评论详情: Bought for my mother in India. Very comfortable in 35 degree C with 80% humidity. Easily machine washable and quick drying. Looks dressier than regular gym wear. She loved it!
This shirt is cute and a flattering design but if you’re going to sweat heavily expect to see every drop. I ordered green, pink and black but only kept the black for this reason

I ordered and received 2 shirts.  The white one was folded nicely in a sealed bag and was fineThe green shirt was not in a sealed bag and was just thrown in.  I don’t think the wrinkles will ever come out.  I was very disappointed
This fits great, is very soft, and is a unique style.
This product is thin. I do not mind in the gym, however I would not like to wear this top as casual wear due to the fact you can see my bra through it. Is breathable and true to size. Does not cling.
This top is so cute!  I love the detail on the sides.  I wish I had gotten it in other colors.  Fits true to size too.

This was purchased for workouts and walking.  It is a lighter fabric that feels good and it can be layered under other clothing or worn on its own.  My fave thing is the split hem so it lays well on women of a certain age.  It is not too short or long
I tried it in pre-wash and liked it bit it shrunk when washed and dried so cant wear it now.

I purchased this top for the gym.The color is pretty and it fits well, however the material is not what I expected. It comes out of the dryer very wrinkled. I have to iron it every time I want to wear it.
It ran small but I thought it was a very cute design.

评论概述: Great cut to hide the muffin top
评论详情: Comfortable and well designed to hide any extra muffin top weight! 😂 Washes well and seems to be of good quality.
I was looking for a casual shirt in a specific shade of grey-green and was having a difficult time finding one.  Not only is this shirt the correct color, it is a quality fabric and a great fit.
Don't like the fit but the material  is comfortable
I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t speak to durability but the fit and drape of the shirt is great. It arrived quickly! Like the color and is very comfortable for gym workouts.

评论概述: Poor durability- hole on first wear
评论详情: Loved the fit, cut and fabric. Wore it once for a workout and noticed a hole. The fabric separated.
I love there clothes and there design.  Great for Yoga, walking, jogging, hanging out.  Im just getting started with my purchases with The Gym.
The top has a cute style. I like the look, but it wrinkles so easily. It’s a workout too that I have to iron. Will not buy another
Very white shirt, not too sheer. Comfortable ordered medium and perfect for warm days
Good for hiki

评论概述: Not great for ladies with larger hip sizes
评论详情: It was plenty large on the top, but for those of us with rounder hips, it was not as full at the bottom as I like.

评论概述: Rather weird the way the back 'flaps' lay.
评论详情: Not crazy about this exercise top.

This shirt ran so crazy small. It is way tighter and shorter than shown. The side slits were not at my side but at my front. If it had been a bit tight I wouldn’t have minded, but it seemed like a totally different size than the tag mentioned.
I really love this shirt, perfect fit, very comfortable.
Sizing / Fit / Quality - all exactly what I was looking for
It is made awkward on the back with the length .
Love the color, the comfort, and cut for size and fit.
Excelente

This shirt is nice and fabric is great. The cut of the shoulders and neck aren’t the most comfortable though. It just sits/moves strange. There’s nothing wrong with it, I just don’t personally feel like it’s the most comfortable for me.
Bueno

Love the purple/gray color of this shirt and the material is very soft. The split detail on the back hips fits a little odd and pulls open. Unfortunately it shrank after one wash which is the reason for the 2 star rating.
Been searching for a stylish non-crop workout shirt and I’m going back for more! Love the detail in the back.

评论概述: I love the feel of the fabric - feels like a million
评论详情: The shirt fits, has room To move, not clinging and feels like butter on my skin. I especially like the lines of this shirt. Very flattering. I am going to order another color.
Love the material and appearance. Keeps cool at the gym.
